name: Logentries
description: There are multiple entry points into the Logentries platform through our API. The Logentries Open API allows you to send and retrieve data, configure certain aspects of your Logentries account (e.g., Tags & Alerts), and also integrate directly into third party APIs, like PagerDuty, HipChat, and Campfire.
